SELECT DISTINCT ENT_ID, TYP.MNEMONIC AS TYPE, CASE WHEN EXP_UTC = '0001-01-01' THEN NULL ELSE EXP_UTC END AS EXPIRY, QTY, UOM.MNEMONIC AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE, FRM.MNEMONIC AS FORM FROM MAT_TBL INNER JOIN ENT_VRSN_TBL USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL UOM ON (MAT_TBL.QTY_CD_ID = UOM.CD_ID AND UOM.HEAD) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL FRM ON (MAT_TBL.FRM_CD_ID = FRM.CD_ID AND FRM.HEAD) LEFT JOIN CD_VRSN_TBL TYP ON (ENT_VRSN_TBL.TYP_CD_ID = TYP.CD_ID AND TYP.HEAD) WHERE ENT_VRSN_TBL.HEAD = TRUE
